All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
The class Account represents a generic account
AccountCard
This class represents an account card that allows the user to select or create an account and play the game.
AccountEvent
Event class for representing changes to an account.
AccountListDatabase
The class AccountListDatabase represents a list of accounts
AccountListener
Listener interface for receiving account events.
AccountTableModel
Table model for displaying a list of accounts in a table.
AiPlayer
The class AiPlayer extends the class Player and represents a generic virtual player in a card game.
AiPlayer.Strategy
The enumeration Strategy represents possible strategy of virtual player
Card
The class Card represents a generic Uno card
Card.Color
The enumeration Color represents possible colors of Uno card
Card.Value
The enum Value represents possible values of Uno card
Controller
The `Controller` class acts as a mediator between the game model and the user interface.
Deck
Represents a deck of playing cards.
DeckPanel
This class represents the panel that displays the deck, game direction, and last card discarded in a game of UNO.
Discarded
Discarded is a Stack subclass that represents a pile of discarded cards in a card game.
Game
The Game class represents a game in the UNO game.
Game.Flipped
An enumeration class representing the two possible states of a card being flipped.
Game.GameDirection
The GameDirection enumeration represents the direction of play in the UNO game.
HomeCard
A panel that serves as the home screen for the UNO game.
JUnoFrame
The main frame for the UNO game.
JUnoMain
The main entry point for the application.
MarginPanel
A panel with margins on all sides to make space between frame and the useful panel.
PanelGradient
A panel with a gradient background.
Player
Represents a player in the game.
PlayerPanel
Represents a panel that displays information about a player in a game of UNO.
SelectColor
A GUI class that allows a user to select a color for a Card object.
TablePanel
A panel that displays a table of accounts.
WinMessage
JFrame for displaying a message when the game is won or lost.
